title: Server
body:
Hiho!
since a week i had big Problems with the Server of Riot.
There were some a week ago, but i have still These Problems, that i disconnect, most before i start a game in the Team builder or in Champion choice.
I think i'm not the only one who has this , but riot doesn't give a Statement here...
My Internet isn't the Problem, i have check it..
Pls help me

Thank you :)
